titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the establishment of a National Motivation and Inspiration Day.
Supporting the goals of a National Motivation and Inspiration Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Civil Service and Agency Organization.
Mrs. Davis, Jo Ann moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 308.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/18/2001--Passed House amended. Supports the goals of a National Motivation and Inspiration Day.
